comments.body: We might want to rename these left/right properties because they'll be reversed in RTL layouts.  Maybe "avatar" and "action" ?

I suppose that when we add support for RTL layouts there will be many left and rights to contend with. Toolbar, margins, padding, Positioned, etc.

Unfortunately the MD spec doesn't provide a unique name for the left and right sides. There's this:
![primary](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1377460/13293280/e4197542-dad3-11e5-9e2b-1e37856ae763.png)
and this:
![left](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1377460/13293287/e94d02b8-dad3-11e5-853e-6769985ff79f.png)

I suppose that we can refer to the left and right widgets however we want. Devs will have to learn what they mean.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@  ListItem({
    Key key,
    this.left,
    this.primary,
    this.secondary,
